scripts.prebuild: rimraf dist && echo Starting build process...
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm run format && pnpm run lint && tsc && pnpm exec webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production
scripts.build:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test rimraf dist && pnpm run format && pnpm run lint && tsc && cross-env NODE_ENV=test pnpm exec webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=development
scripts.build:withtest: pnpm run format && pnpm run test:run && pnpm run lint && pnpm run ts-check && pnpm exec webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production
scripts.build:vercel: pnpm run format && pnpm run lint && pnpm run ts-check && pnpm exec webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production
scripts.start: pnpm run build:test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_URL=sqlite:database.sqlite node src/env-check.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test node dist/index.js
scripts.check-build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const exists=fs.existsSync('./dist'); console.log('dist directory exists:', exists); if(exists) { const files=fs.readdirSync('./dist'); console.log('Files in dist:', files); }"
scripts.install-deps: pnpm add -D webpack@5.75.0 webpack-cli@4.10.0 webpack-node-externals ts-loader rimraf tsconfig-paths-webpack-plugin
